Posts.Content: I tried to send this before, I don't know if it went through - just to say thank you for your help, I appreciate it.
Posts.Title: Advice required on best doctor/surgeon/hospital for breast cancer

Posts.Content: Dear All A friend of mine has just been diagnosed with breast cancer. Can anyone recommend a particularly good private or NHS doctor/surgeon/hospital for her, within the London/Kent area? I don't know what stage the cancer is at as she is still to have a biopsy, although her current clinic has recommended chemotherapy. Thanks in advance, Fr1end01
Posts.Title: Advice required on best doctor/surgeon/hospital for breast cancer
